name: I Am a Cube
description:
Multiplayer cooperative game. Collect the cubes!

Game has been created by Anita Ghoddoomi-Zadeh and Alexander Xu.

HOW TO PLAY

Move using the ARROW KEYS/ WASD.

Work together to collect as many pickups as possible in 3 minutes to get the highest score.

Open locked rooms for each other by standing on corresponding buttons.

Use SPACE to signal that you are ready to move down to a new layer.
All players will move to a new layer once every player has signaled ready.

There are 20 pickups on each layer.
Every pickup on one layer will give more points than the previous ones.

1st pickup = 10
20th pickup = 4000

CREDITS

Thanks so much Alex for all your hard work with the programming.
This game could never have been multiplayer without you.

Thanks also to Diana Darie for your ideas, support, and
programming at the start of the project.

Additional credits to David King and Alan Zucconi 
for all your advice and help!

Thanks also to all my classmates at LCC.
